TopicTitle: Platform Enigma- an off topic chat thread.

Articles.Content:
Woah. my vision's messing up a bit. I think it may be close to 36 hours since I last slept.

To the Dr. Pepper storage!
Just on a random note, I want to start making Pokemon video game videos on my channel. Once I figure out how to.

Just on a random note, I want to start making Pokemon video game videos on my channel. Once I figure out how to.
Okay? What else do you have on you channel?
At the most basic, I'd suggest running a PokÃƒÂ©mon game on an emulator, and using a screencapturer such as Fraps to record it.

Say, Mercy. was this basically the first thread you came to? because as far as I can tell you just joined today.

@canopus: Why not?

No, I posted in the GD forum then came around here for a look about and you've kept me occupied.
We tend to have that effect on people.
new topic?: music chain go!

Well, I guess I should go to bed. I have the hospital tomorrow.

Goodnight peoples.
I am awesome.

Well, I guess I should go to bed. I have the hospital tomorrow.

Goodnight peoples.

No...What would you do that?...ssssssStay here....With ussssssssssssssss...Procrassssstinate.....

May your hospital visit be quick and painless.

Music chain? Well, I am a fan of MCR, and Royal Republic are far from bad as well, I guess.
What's a music chain?
...My heart is melting...So cute AAAWWWWWWWWWW.
I thought a music chain was another term for a band, but that turned out to not be true, so I'm also curious.

Oh, dear goodness

*has heart attack and dies from TEH CUTE*

Oh, dear goodness

*has heart attack and dies from TEH CUTE*

Oh, God...What have I done.

I got this!

Music chain=type up song thing usually referred to when youtuber reply to a comment that is part of the song in the video.

Start:76 Tormbones leaded the big parade...

Edit:You can not give me a cute ovedose related heart attack I feel no cute.

D'AWWWWWWWWW

*snorgles Dr. Tinycat's wee wittle belleh*

On a related note, Doctor Cat is an adorable hilarious webcomic. Shame it only updates on Fridays...
I just realised that Trekkette is Your Best Daydream, while Chobit is Your Worst Nightmare. It's the little things...
Yeah, Chobit changed hers a few days ago. I think that hers is kinda silly, though. She's not Batman!
I noticed that about three or four days ago. when I finally understood it was like
Imagine if she were batman. None would be safe. Not even the people batman would protect in any other scenario.
*shudders* Dear god...That would actually be a legitimate "get to the nuke shelter" moment.

Bunkers would be of no use against the batman, he gets into that sort of thing in moments. No, what we'd really need to do is find the Joker. That bloke always survives and escapes, usually while causing extreme property damage to boot.
Not if Chobit was The Batman. Joker'd be jailed and/or dead in 30 minutes or less.
